resources.string: System Programming, Embedded Systems, Operating Systems
C is an efficient low-level programming language that is widely used for system development, including operating systems and applications that require high performance.
Game Development, System Programming, High-Performance Applications
C++ is an extension of the C language with object-oriented programming features, used in game development, high-performance applications, and system software.
Desktop Applications, Web Applications, Game Development
C# is an object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft, widely used for developing desktop, web, and game applications using the .NET platform.
Enterprise Applications, Android Development, Web Development
Java is a popular object-oriented programming language, known for its portability, "Write Once, Run Anywhere". Widely used in enterprise and Android application development.
Web Development, Front-End Development, Back-End Development
JavaScript is the primary programming language for web development, used to create dynamic and interactive web pages. It can be used on both the client-side (front-end) and server-side (back-end).
Android Development, Web Development, Server-Side Applications
Kotlin is a modern programming language that is interoperable with Java, and is now the primary language for Android app development. Kotlin offers a more concise syntax and advanced features.
Web Development, Dynamic Web, Server-Side Scripting

PHP is a programming language used primarily for server-side web development. It is widely used to build dynamic websites and web applications, and is the foundation of many content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress.
Web Development, Data Analysis, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning
Python is a programming language that is easy to learn and use, with clear and simple syntax. It is widely used in various fields such as web development, data analysis, and artificial intelligence.
Donald D. Chamberlin dan Raymond F. Boyce
Database Management, Data Querying, Data Manipulation

SQL (Structured Query Language) is a language used to manage and manipulate data in a relational database management system. SQL allows users to retrieve, insert, update, and delete data in a database.
iOS Development, macOS Development, Server-Side Applications
Swift is a fast and safe programming language developed by Apple for developing applications for iOS, macOS, and other apple products. Swift is designed to be easy to learn and use.
